scripts.pretest: mkdir -p allure-results/history && cp -r allure-report/history allure-results/ || true && node setupAllure.js
scripts.allure:copy-history: if exist allure-report\history xcopy /E /Y allure-report\history allure-results\history
scripts.allure:generate: npm run allure:copy-history && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
